ðŸ“– Summary: First 2 Apply is an open-source job board aggregator that consolidates listings from platforms like LinkedIn and Indeed. It consists of a Supabase backend and a desktop probe application. The project aims to streamline the job search process for users by providing a centralized view of available opportunities.
